# Hydra-Cardano-Yaci Documentation

> Automation and tooling for Cardano Hydra/Yaci devnet workflows.

## Overview
This documentation will help you:
- Set up and run a Cardano devnet with Hydra Head
- Use the system with or without Docker
- Generate keys, configure nodes, and manage the Hydra Head lifecycle

## Contents
- [Introduction](intro.md): What is this project and what can you do with it?
- [Setup & Usage](setup.md): Step-by-step guide for both Docker and non-Docker workflows

---
For advanced details, see the scripts in the `scripts/` directory and configuration in `config/`.
